Other Information.Additional Info: Residual water molecules do not block CO2 adsorption.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Blocked by residual water molecules in pore A

Other Information.Additional Info: Preferential sites for acetylene are occupied by water, suppressing its adsorption.

Sieving Mechanism: Suppression of acetylene adsorption due to blockage of preferential sites by residual water molecules.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2/C2H2 selectivity: >105, C2H2 productivity: 166 mmol per kg sorbent

Other Information.Additional Info: Cu-F-pymo shows remarkable stability under harsh conditions and can be regenerated easily with helium at room temperature.
